text: Joachim Gérard and Stéphane Houdet were the defending champions, but lost to Gustavo Fernández and Nicolas Peifer in the semifinals. Shingo Kunieda and Gordon Reid won the title, defeating Fernández and Peifer in the final, 6–1, 7–6(7–1). ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ==References== * Draw Wheelchair Men's Doubles French Open, 2015 Men's Doubles
title: 2015 French Open – Wheelchair Men's Doubles
